title: The Pool Hall (Person of Interest)(2 x 9)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: Bear needs his own spin off...DOI, Dog Of Interest.
I like how he just walks all over Demon8's hacker rep.
I would definitely get bit by Bear over getting hit with like a 70 mph billard ball.
Harold got tougher as the series went on...

“Shoot the dog.” 

No! Don’t shoot the dog!
description:
Harold goes to buy a laptop from a person on the black market although he runs into some trouble.
